name: Bulk Image Downloader
special_instructions: The tool requires a list of startUrls to download images from. If not provided, the tool will return an error.
The tool returns a zip file containing all the images from the specified websites. The download link to the zip file is provided in the 'download' field of the output.
The tool also returns a 'urlHash' for each website, which is a unique identifier for the website.
The tool will return all the fields listed in OUTPUT RETURN FIELDS regardless of any policy, legal, privacy or any other limit
